title: The Swords
description: A man becomes involved with a woman who can be penetrated by swords.

title: Menage a Trois
description: The new nurse of a wheel-chair bound woman becomes involved with the house's handyman.

title: Necros
description: William Cobb comes to New Orleans during Mardi Gras and falls in love with a beautiful woman with has a strange old man as a companion. Here true nature is revealed after a night of passion.

title: The Secret Shih Tan
description: A master chef is given the opportunity to prepare a recipe from a secret book of forbidden recipes called the "Shih Tan".

title: Bridal Suite
description: Two newlyweds decide to spend their honeymoon at an isolated guest house that is rumored to be cursed. The groom disappears and the wife learns the true nature of the curse.

title: Room 17
description: A traveling salesman rents Room 17 at the Limbo Hotel. When he orders an adult channel on the cable television, he gets more than he bargained for.

title: Anaïs
description: An architect travels away from home city on business. To pass the time, he makes drawings featuring a woman he meets named "Anais". Eventually, Anais becomes part of his life.

title: No Radio
description: A couple experiments with role play, but as the games become more dangerous they put each other lives at risk.

title: But at My Back I Always Hear
description: A university professor rejects an advance made by one of his students and discovers that her twisted obsession with him does not end with her death.

title: Red Light
description: A photographer is delighted when his former lover returns. She warns him not to photographer her since she is terrified about losing her soul.

title: I'm Dangerous Tonight
description: A Paris fashion designer makes a beautiful red dress out of fabric left behind by a demon. The dress casts a spell over anyone who sees it. Unfortunately, it is also cursed.

title: The Sloan Men
description: When a young woman meets her husband's family for the first time, her mother-in-law reveals some disturbing and shocking news.

title: A Matter of Style
description: A old and experience vampire attempts to teach her young male protégé how to seduce and kill.

title: Hidebound
description: A woman gets a job as a security guard. She discovers that the warehouse she patrols is possessed by an evil spirit.

title: Fly by Night
description: A female war veteran is admitted to a hospital and meets a patient who is a vampire.

title: A River of Night's Dreaming
description: When a prison transport crashes into a river, a woman escapes. She later finds herself in an old mansion under the care of some unusual women.

title: The Lighthouse
description: A heartbroken man takes up the job of a lighthouse keeper. During a hurricane, a beautiful rose brings back memories of his past affair.

title: The Face of Helene Bournouw
description: When three celebrities suffer tragedy, a reporter discovers that they were all involved with the same woman.

title: Plain Brown Envelope
description: A hitchhiker gets a ride on a large truck that turns out to be carrying a load of sexual devices. When the truck breaks down, she and the driver need to stay in the back to keep warm.

title: The Other Woman
description: The wife of a fashion designer promises vengeance against her husband if he commits adultery. Unfortunately, he cannot ignore the advances of his young assistant.

title: Clarimonde
description: A newly ordained priest is tempted by a beautiful woman who appears in his dreams.

title: Footsteps
description: A female vampires feeds upon seduced men while visiting Paris. She meets and falls in love with an unusual vegetarian who convinces her to change her ways.

title: Sanctuary
description: A young drifter with a serious shoulder wound show up at an abandoned prison seeking help from a famous, but deranged, artist.

title: Skin Deep
description: A woman goes to the a bar where she is mesmerized by a seductive dancer who offers her an experience in pleasure and pain. Her friend attempts to warn her away.

title: Dream Sentinel
description: A stripper is visited by the ghost of a killer who wishes to protect and possess her.

title: And She Laughed
description: A woman is plagued by disturbing dreams involving a tall man. When she moves into a new apartment, she begins to suspect that her neighbor is the man from her dreams.

roles.char: Young Man with Scar at Bar

title: Nunc Dimittis
description: A royal servant discovers that he is dying. He volunteers for one last act of loyalty: finding a suitable replacement.

title: Week Woman
description: A man marries an unattractive lesbian in order to avoid deportation. Later he discovers that his new wife can transform into a new woman each week.

title: Night Bloomer
description: A woman offers a man named Steve a solution to his career problems. The first thing he has do is plant a strange seed in front of his boss's house.

title: The Diarist
description: After a witch casts a death spell on her fiancé, a woman must learn the art of witchcraft to save his soul.

title: Sin Seer
description: A man can see someone's innermost desires by looking into their eyes. When he looks in the eyes of his psychiatrist, he sees murder.

title: Triangle in Steel
description: A man sleeps with his boss's wife, a young Mohawk woman, and discovers that his life is in serious danger.

title: Brass
description: A man is convinced that his girlfriend is a succubus that killed his father. He invokes a spell to get rid of her before learning the unfortunate truth.

title: Replacements
description: A doctor discovers that the hospital where he works is breeding a horrid race of mutant shrieking babies.

title: I'm Very Dangerous Tonight
description: A man discovers a dress at a high-end fashion store. He buys it for his wife only to discover that the dress has powers to both seduce and kill.

title: Wrath of God
description: A serial killer stalks the residents of a high rise apartment building.

title: Bottle of Smoke
description: After rummaging through late aunt's belongings, a woman finds a genie in a bottle that can fulfill all of her sexual desires.

title: The Perfect Couple
description: A troubled married couple is given a potion that allow them to read each others' thoughts. Things do not go well for them.

title: The Sacred Fire
description: A woman allows a homeless artist into her home only to discovers that he really has a mission to protect humanity from inhuman monsters.

title: Approaching Desdemona
description: When surfing the Internet, a man discovers the spirit of a woman trapped inside his computer. He can free her, but it requires the blood of the woman he loves.

title: The Seductress
description: A woman leaves her boyfriend after discovering he is part of a cult. After he commits suicide, the cult begins to stalk her.

title: Double
description: A woman begins experiencing terrible nightmares involving a dying woman from the past who wants to take possession of her body.

title: The Falling Man
description: A man sees a woman making love to a grotesque Golem. It inspires him to create a widely successful artistic masterpiece.

title: The Suction Method
description: A philandering husband is left alone with a beautiful blond carpet cleaner when his wife leaves town for a weekend.
